channel.title: WHATWG XMLHttpRequest Workstream-relevant MDN issues
channel.description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by WHATWG XMLHttpRequest Workstream

item.title: [xhr] xhr.abort is inaccurate
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/XMLHttpRequest/abort

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

No response

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

"The XMLHttpRequest.abort() method aborts the request if it has already been sent. When a request is aborted, its readyState is changed to XMLHttpRequest.UNSENT (0) and the request's status code is set to 0."

What did you expect to see?

Compare to the spec, it's clear that this doesn't cover the second case:

If this’s state is opened with this’s send() flag set, headers received, or loading, then run the request error steps for this and abort.

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

No response

Do you have anything more you want to share?

No response

item.title: [xhr] Document FormData constructor submitter parameter
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/FormData/FormData

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

Syntax, Examples

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

The submitter parameter is not yet included

What did you expect to see?

The submitter parameter should be documented and have an example.

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

Spec discussion/motivation: whatwg/xhr#262
Spec PR (merged): whatwg/xhr#366
Tests PR (merged): web-platform-tests/wpt#37895
Spec: https://xhr.spec.whatwg.org/#interface-formdata

Do you have anything more you want to share?

No response

item.title: [xhr] Issue with "FormData()": type=submit inputs not included
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/FormData/FormData

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

The docs do not mention that FormData is ignoring input type=submit elements.
That is unexpected. A plain HTML submit of a form will include submit inputs.
This feature is useful to implement multiple different submit buttons.

Specific section or headline?

Potentially add it to "Note: Only successful form controls are included..."

What did you expect to see?

Information about this unexpected behaviour, potentially a "Gotchas" section.

Did you test this? If so, how?

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <body>
    <script>
      function handleSubmit(e) {
        e.preventDefault()
        const form = document.getElementById("myForm")
        const data = new FormData(form)
        for (var [key, value] of data.entries()) {
          console.log(key, value)
        }
        return false
      }
    </script>

    <form method="POST" id="myForm" onsubmit="return handleSubmit(event)">
      <input type="text" name="text" value="text" /><br />
      <input type="number" name="number" value="1" /><br />
      <input type="submit" name="submit1" value="Submit1" /><br />
      <input type="submit" name="submit2" value="Submit2" /><br />
    </form>

  </body>
</html>

Slightly different Svelte version in REPL

MDN Content page report details
  • Folder: en-us/web/api/formdata/formdata
  • MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/FormData/FormData
  • GitHub URL: https://github.com/mdn/content/blob/main/files/en-us/web/api/formdata/formdata/index.md
  • Last commit: c9a795a
  • Document last modified: 2022-01-28T12:28:43.000Z

item.title: [xhr] Issue with "FormData()": missing formdata event documentation
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/FormData/FormData

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

This page should mention and link to the formdata event.

The main FormData could also mention this event,.

Specific section or headline?

What did you expect to see?

Information about the FormDatas constructor running the event listeners for formdata and a link to this event's documentation.

Did you test this? If so, how?

MDN Content page report details
  • Folder: en-us/web/api/formdata/formdata
  • MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/FormData/FormData
